Name: GOD EATER 3
About the game: Rise Above a World of Desolation The latest entry in the hugely popular God Eater action series is here! • Fight in Style with Brand-new God Arcs! Expand your close-combat armory with the dual-wield God Arc “Biting Edge” and the two-handed moon axe ''Heavy Moon'', or fight from afar with the new ''Ray Gun'' God Arc! • New Abilities for Exhilarating Battles! Ground, Air, and Step attacks evolve into powerful techniques with Burst Arts, and the new Dive dash attack allows you full freedom of movement to hunt down wandering Aragami! • Fearsome New Threats: Ash Aragami and Devour Attacks! Dangerous new foes, Ash Aragami can utilize Devours Attacks and enter Burst Mode, increasing their strength exponentially! These enemies are not to be trifled with and will require you to take your weapon and your game to the next level!
